# Date operations

This folder contains extensions that help with date-related actions.

## ConvertDate


**<u>Description</u>**: This NLP extension allows you to convert a date from one format to "dd-mm-yyyy". This is useful when dates are stored in different ways in different systems or in API calls.

**<u>How to Use</u>**:
1. Write a step: `ConvertDate(dateinput) returning $converteddate`.
2. **dateinput** is the date string that you stored from another place, eg: an API call.




### Details
- **Description:** This extension converts dates from one format to another
- **Inputs:** ["dateinput"]
- **Resources:** []
- **Async:** false
- [Add to Production (Europe)](https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=ConvertDate&org=true&)
- [Add to Production (US)](https://app-us.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=ConvertDate&org=true&)
- [Add to Free trial](https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=ConvertDate&org=true&)
## FutureDateUK


**<u>Description</u>**:  This NLP extension allows you to generate a future date in the standard UK format or dd-mm-yyyy.

**<u>How to Use</u>**:
1. Write a step: `FutureDateUK(DayCount) returning $result`.
2. **DayCount** is the number of days in the future for which you want to generate the date.
3. You will get a date string in the response in the "dd-mm-yyyy" format.




### Details
- **Description:** Returns a future date with a given number of days in UK format
- **Inputs:** ["DayCount"]
- **Resources:** [{"kind":"EXTERNAL","url":"https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/moment.js/2.29.2/moment.min
- **Async:** false
- [Add to Production (Europe)](https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=FutureDateUK&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Production (US)](https://app-us.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=FutureDateUK&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Free trial](https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=FutureDateUK&org=true&%3D)
## FutureDateUS


**<u>Description</u>**:This NLP extension allows you to generate a future date in the standard US format or mm-dd-yyyy.
**<u>How to Use</u>**:
1. Write a step: `FutureDateUS(DayCount) returning $result`.
2. **DayCount** is the number of days in the future for which you want to generate the date.
3. You will get a date string in the response in the "mm-dd-yyyy" format.




### Details
- **Description:** Returns a future date with a given number of days in US format
- **Inputs:** ["DayCount"]
- **Resources:** [{"kind":"EXTERNAL","url":"https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/moment.js/2.29.2/moment.min
- **Async:** false
- [Add to Production (Europe)](https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=FutureDateUS&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Production (US)](https://app-us.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=FutureDateUS&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Free trial](https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=FutureDateUS&org=true&%3D)
## TodayUK

**<u>Description</u>**: This NLP extension allows you to generate today's date in the standard UK format or dd-mm-yyyy.

**<u>How to Use</u>**:
1. Write a step: `TodayUK returning $result`.
2. You will get a date string in the response in the "dd-mm-yyyy" format.





### Details
- **Description:** Generates today's date in dd/mm/yyyy format
- **Inputs:** []
- **Resources:** []
- **Async:** false
- [Add to Production (Europe)](https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=TodayUK&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Production (US)](https://app-us.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=TodayUK&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Free trial](https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=TodayUK&org=true&%3D)
## TodayUS


**<u>Description</u>**: This NLP extension allows you to generate today's date in the standard US format or mm-dd-yyyy.
**<u>How to Use</u>**:
1. Write a step: `TodayUS returning $result`.
2. You will get a date string in the response in the "mm-dd-yyyy" format.




### Details
- **Description:** Generates today's date in mm/dd/yyyy format
- **Inputs:** []
- **Resources:** []
- **Async:** false
- [Add to Production (Europe)](https://app.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=TodayUS&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Production (US)](https://app-us.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=TodayUS&org=true&%3D)
- [Add to Free trial](https://app2.virtuoso.qa/#/add-language-extension?name=TodayUS&org=true&%3D)
